content: **knitted hat in 2 strands drops air piece is knitted in rib** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-144 yarn group c + c or e ---------------------------------------------------------- size one-size head circumference 56/58 cm = 22 /22 3/4 **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g color 20 rose ---------------------------------------------------------- accessories for the piece **knitting gauge ** 12 stitches in width and 16 row vertically in stockinette stitch and 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops double pointed needles size 7 mm = us 10 75 drops circular needle size 7 mm = us 10 74 length 40 cm = 16 needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles
